entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Near blizzard. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Near blizzard developing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 25.
